import { useEffect } from "react" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { getOrderDetails } from "../../../redux/actions/orderActions" import {Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Row, Image} from 'react-bootstrap' export const OrderDetails = () => { const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) //console.log(orderDetails) const {order} = orderDetails //console.log(order) const products = order?.order_items const dispatch = useDispatch() const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(id)) }, [dispatch] ) return (

Details de ma commande

{order?.user.first_name} {order?.user.last_name}

{order?.user.address}

Montant Total

Articles

aucune commande

)}
) }
